document_data.mainbody:
Naneatha Lharilstars residence was a row house and the home of Naneatha Lharilstar located in Waterdeep during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
The home stood three stories tall. 
Naneatha Lharilstars residence was located in the southern section of Waterdeeps Castle Ward on the south side of Gem Street across from the House of Gems. The rear of the house faced Hillock Court.
